mapper.update: update t_salary set path=#{path} where salary_id =#{salaryId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.XM,a.LOGINID , b.project_name,b.money ,c.salary_name,c.type,d.type project_type,c.path,c.approval_time from (SELECT ID,XM,LOGINID from zxjz0101 where SCHID = #{schId}) a inner JOIN (SELECT user_id,name project_name,money,salary_id from t_salary_user_attr WHERE salary_id = #{salaryId}) b on b.user_id=a.ID inner JOIN (SELECT `name` salary_name,type,salary_id ,path,approval_time from t_salary where salary_id = #{salaryId} ) c on c.salary_id = b.salary_id inner JOIN t_salary_person_project d on d.`name` = b.project_name ORDER BY a.XM,project_type,b.project_name
SELECT salary_id,name,#{userId} user_id ,DATE_FORMAT(provide_time,'%Y年%m月') project_name,destroy,read_time from t_salary where salary_id = #{salaryId}

select a.project_name,a.money ,b.type from (SELECT user_id,`name` project_name,money from t_salary_user_attr WHERE user_id = #{userId} and salary_id = #{salaryId}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT name,type from t_salary_person_project where salary_id = #{salaryId}) b on b.`name`=a.project_name order by b.type
SELECT look_status,confim_status,look_time create_time from t_salary_person where salary_id = #{salaryId} and user_id = #{userId}
